channel.title: Home on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Home on My New Hugo Site

item.title: General markdown
item.description: Tutorial demonstrates basic markdown usage. The content of this page will be shown via shortcode. Introduction My Heading My Subheading sections links lists Introduction One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. My Heading He lay on his armour-like back, and if he lifted his head a little he could see his brown belly, slightly domed and divided by arches into stiff sections.

item.title: Overview
item.description: Please explain in few sentences the basic idea of this template and choosen approach (github-pages + github + bootstrap). Give links to most important resources and tutorials.

item.title: Get started
item.description: Please explain how to start. How to install hugo How to set-up gh-pages branch. How to modify content (i.e. add item to the documentation) and publish on gh-pages.

item.title: Insert images
item.description: This tutorial explains, how to insert image in the text. standalone image between two paragraphs, centered image wrapped by the text same, provided with a caption bigger image scaled down, linked to original size image 2 images next to each other, provided with caption

item.title: Very long title to see how it looks in the menu
Python code highlighted
item.description: This tutorial explains, how to insert Python snippets in the text with and without line numbering.

item.title: Python code embedded
item.description: This tutorial explains how to embed Python code from a script, located in same directory.

item.title: Allerts, notices and panels
item.description: This tutorial demonstrates, how to insert various alerts, colored boxes etc to highlight information on a page,

item.title: Action buttons
item.description: Tutorial demonstrates, how to insert action buttons (i.e. links to travis builds, “follow me” etc)

item.title: Labels and icons
item.description: Tutorial demonstrates, how to insert labels (like “new”, “updated”) to the text; place small glypicons.

item.title: Image gallery
item.description: Image gallery for screenshots and similar. Grid of image 3x3, click on image starts gallery.

item.title: Tabs embedded, accordions
item.description: A page with information structured in accordion-manner, or in tabs (e.g. installation instruction in tab “Windows” and tab “Linux”).

item.title: About
item.description: Useful links https://themes.gohugo.io/theme/greyshade/post/creating-a-new-theme/ https://discourse.gohugo.io/t/simple-deployment-to-gh-pages/5003 http://zackofalltrades.com/notes/2014/05/hugo-from-scratch/ https://gohugo.io/variables/ Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
